pages.prompt: Professional 3D Pixar style, child character wearing a striped sweatshirt, playing in a room, next to a glass of water on a table, 'Hero of Truth' written in the background
pages.text: المية دلقت.. طش! الهدوم مبلولة!

pages.prompt: Professional 3D Pixar style, mother standing and asking the child 'Who did this?', child character wearing a striped sweatshirt looking thoughtful
pages.text: ماما سألت: مين؟ بطلنا فكر..

pages.prompt: Professional 3D Pixar style, child character wearing a striped sweatshirt, pointing at themselves with a tiny finger, looking at mother honestly
pages.text: بطلنا قال: أنا! هو مش خايف، هو صادق.

pages.prompt: Professional 3D Pixar style, mother wiping the spilled water and smiling warmly at the child character wearing a striped sweatshirt, 'Bravo!' expression
pages.text: ماما قالت: برافو! إنت بطل عشان قلت الحق

pages.prompt: Professional 3D Pixar style, child character wearing a striped sweatshirt and mother playing together happily, laughter, warm living room setting
pages.text: بطلنا فرحان.. الصدق جميل يا أبطال.

pages.prompt: Professional 3D Pixar style, child character playing with a ball in a garden, a small cute sheep standing nearby saying baa
pages.text: كان يا ما كان.. فيه شجر كتير وخروف بيقول ماء ماء. {child_name} كان بيلعب بالكورة.

pages.prompt: Professional 3D Pixar style, a ball hitting a beautiful flower vase, the vase is breaking and falling to the ground
pages.text: الكورة طارت.. بوم! خبطت في الزرع ووقعته على الأرض. يا خبر!

pages.prompt: Professional 3D Pixar style, a mother standing and asking who did this, child character looking at the broken plant, sheep hiding behind a tree
pages.text: ماما جت وسألت: مين عمل كده؟ الخروف جري واستخبى ورا الشجرة.

pages.prompt: Professional 3D Pixar style, child character raising their hand bravely, holding the ball, looking at mother with a brave smile
pages.text: {child_name} البطل فكر.. وقال بصوت شجاع: أنا يا ماما.. أنا قولت الحق!

pages.prompt: Professional 3D Pixar style, mother hugging the child warmly, a large heart or a checkmark in the background, warm colors
pages.text: ماما حضنته أوي: يا روحي يا بطل! عشان إنت صادق، أنا مش زعلانة.. إنت بطل الصدق!

pages.prompt: Panel 1 (Book Cover): Toddler stands heroically in the foreground, pointing to a mended vase on a nearby table. Title 'بطل في الصدق' is written clearly at the top in playful Arabic script. [Name] appears in a gentle pastel arc banner around toddler's head. Simple watercolor style, clean white background.
pages.text:
بطل في الصدق
{child_name}

pages.prompt: Panel 2: Toddler joyfully kicking a soft ball in a cozy room, near a table with a colorful, cheerful vase. Toddler is mid-action, full of innocent energy. Proportions: Toddler is hip-height to where the mother would stand. Watercolor and colored pencil style, soft pastel palette.
pages.text: كان يا ما كان.. فيه فازة جميلة أوي ماما بتحبها. {child_name} كان بيلعب كورة.. 'هوب!'.

pages.prompt: Panel 3: The soft colored ball has just struck the table, sending the colorful vase tumbling mid-air and shattering on the floor. Toddler (1/2 height of table) stands nearby in shock, wide-eyed, hands to cheeks. Watercolor style, white background, emotional focus.
pages.text: الكورة خبطت في الفازة.. 'كررراش!'. الفازة وقعت واتكسرت. يا خبر! أعمل إيه دلوقتي؟

pages.prompt: Panel 4: Mother (gentle, concerned, warm pastel clothing) enters. Toddler is thinking with finger on chin, glancing towards a toy cat in background. Proportions: Toddler hip-height to mother. Watercolor style, simple shapes, clear outlines.
pages.text: ماما جت سألت: 'مين كسر الفازة؟'. بطلنا فكر.. ممكن أقول القطة؟ لا، أنا بطل.

pages.prompt: Panel 5: Toddler stands tall, back straight, facing the mother with open hands, looking up sincerely. Mother listens with visible compassion and warmth. Toddler is exactly half the height of the mother. Watercolor style, focus on sincerity.
pages.text: بطلنا وقف ضهره مفرود وقال: 'أنا يا ماما.. أنا اللي خبطتها غصب عني.. أنا آسف'.

pages.prompt: Panel 6: Mother hugs toddler tightly, both smiling warmly. They are safely cleaning the remains with a broom in a sunlit room. Proportions: Toddler is small and embraced by the large mother. Warm, happy conclusion, watercolor style.
pages.text: ماما حضنته وقالت: 'الفازة تتصلح، بس صدقك هو الأغلى عندي! إنت بطل الصدق يا حبيبي'.

pages.prompt: Professional 3D Pixar style, child character wearing a striped sweatshirt, holding an empty flower pot with only soil, 'The Honest Hero' written in the background, ancient Chinese city setting
pages.text: الملك أدى لكل أطفال المدينة بذور وقال: اللي هيزرع أجمل وردة هيكون هو البطل. بطلنا أخد البذرة وزرعها وسقاها كل يوم.

pages.prompt: Professional 3D Pixar style, child character wearing a striped sweatshirt, looking sad at an empty pot with soil, other children in the background with huge colorful flowers, garden setting
pages.text: كل الأطفال ورداتهم طلعت أوي تجنن، لكن إناء بطلنا فضل فاضي. بطلنا كان حزين بس فضل يسقيها.

pages.prompt: Professional 3D Pixar style, child character wearing a striped sweatshirt, standing in a grand palace hall, holding only the empty pot, looking nervous but brave, a wise king in the distance
pages.text: جه يوم المسابقة، كل الأطفال معاهم ورد، وبطلنا راح بالإناء الفاضي وهو خايف بس قال: لازم أقول الحقيقة.

pages.prompt: Professional 3D Pixar style, child character wearing a striped sweatshirt, talking to the King, pointing to the empty pot, speaking bravely
pages.text: الملك سأل بطلنا: فين وردتك؟ بطلنا رد بشجاعة: أنا زرعتها وسقيتها بس م طلعتش، أنا آسف.

pages.prompt: Professional 3D Pixar style, the King laughing and putting a crown on the child character wearing a striped sweatshirt, celebration scene, other children looking surprised
pages.text: الملك ضحك وقال: إنت البطل! لأن البذور كانت مطبوخة ومستحيل تطلع ورد، والكل كذب إلا إنت!
